downloadTitle: The Telecom Group Saves Employees over NZ$2million Recommended Retail with Microsoft Home Use Programme
downloadDescription: "The Home Use Programme has been a huge success with our employees, and adds to our overall employee benefits package. Through the Home Use Programme staff have access to the latest Office software at home saving employees over NZ$2million from recommended retail pricing."
detailsSection:
Telecom is well-known for supplying information technology and traditional telecommunication services that help customers to communicate and make better decisions through access to information.

To help attract and retain the best people Telecom offers employees a comprehensive benefits package that demonstrates its commitment to supporting a strong team.

When Microsoft introduced the Home Use Programme as part of its Software Assurance package, as an Enterprise Agreement customer Telecom leveraged this opportunity to offer staff access to the latest Office software on their home computers.

With an uptake of over 2040 Telecom employees this benefit has been tremendously popular, saving each member of staff who took advantage of the programme $1180 off the normal retail licensing costs.
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
